name: Pacific Flight Aviation
about: Pacific Flight Aviation, based at John Wayne Airport in Orange County, California, offers comprehensive flight training programs for Private Pilot, Instrument Rating, and Commercial Pilot certificates. Our courses combine hands-on training with traditional lessons, adhering to Federal Aviation Administration (FAA) requirements. Students are guided by experienced instructors through structured syllabi, ensuring organization, consistency, and safety. We provide personalized 1-on-1 flight and ground instruction, flexible scheduling, and use a diverse fleet including Piper Archer III, Piper Arrow III, Piper Seneca V, and Cirrus SR22-T aircraft. Our training includes all necessary materials and resources, preparing students for successful careers in aviation. With a focus on individual success, we ensure each student is trained to proficiency as required by the FAA. Join us to embark on a rewarding journey to become a certified pilot.
services:
["Biennial Flight Review
Instrument Proficiency Check
Intro Flight
Commercial
Private Pilot
